title: Spellbook of passwall
data:
| [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of +   passwall   [![Light green spellbook.png](/images/7/7d/Light_green_spellbook.png)](/wiki/File:Light_green_spellbook.png) |                                                               |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                              | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
|                                                                                                                                                                         |                                                               |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                              | 600 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                             |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                  | [50](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                   |
| Turns to read                                                                                                                                                           | 42                                                            |
| Ink to write                                                                                                                                                            | [30–59](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                         |                                                               |
| Spell type                                                                                                                                                              | [body](/wiki/Body_spells "Body spells")                       |
| Level                                                                                                                                                                   | 6                                                             |
| Power cost                                                                                                                                                              | 30 [Pw](/wiki/Power "Power")                                  |
| Direction                                                                                                                                                               | non-directional                                               |

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the **[spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of passwall** allows the player to learn the **spell of passwall**. It is a level 6 [body spell](/wiki/Body_spell "Body spell").

## Description

Casting the spell grants temporary [intrinsic](/wiki/Intrinsic "Intrinsic") [phasing](/wiki/Phasing "Phasing"), allowing you to pass through solid walls and other objects for anywhere between 50 and 149 turns before they become solid again; if you are in a solid object when the phasing wears off, you will be stuck there unless you can [dig](/wiki/Dig "Dig") yourself out, [pray](/wiki/Pray "Pray"), or cast the spell again.

## Strategy

Be careful when you cast passwall without enough power to cast it or a [spell of dig](/wiki/Spell_of_dig "Spell of dig"), or at least a [pick-axe](/wiki/Pick-axe "Pick-axe") or [dwarvish mattock](/wiki/Dwarvish_mattock "Dwarvish mattock") to dig yourself out of a wall with - you may find yourself stuck waiting to power up again for a while, leaving yourself open to other phasing monsters such as [xorns](/wiki/Xorn "Xorn"). On the other hand, if you find yourself being pummeled and there are no such monsters nearby, you can stick yourself in a wall while you wait to heal.

## Messages

- You feel a little more solid.

  Your temporary phasing ability has worn off.

* *This page is a **[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM")** related **[stub](/wiki/Category:SLASH%27EM_stubs "Category:SLASH'EM stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Spellbook_of_passwall\&action=edit)*

html:
Spellbook of passwall

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
spellbook of
+   passwall  
Appearance random
Base price 600 zm
Weight 50
Turns to read 42
Ink to write 30–59
Spell type body
Level 6
Power cost 30 Pw
Direction non-directional

In SLASH'EM, the spellbook of passwall allows the player to learn the spell of passwall. It is a level 6 body spell.

Description

Casting the spell grants temporary intrinsic phasing, allowing you to pass through solid walls and other objects for anywhere between 50 and 149 turns before they become solid again; if you are in a solid object when the phasing wears off, you will be stuck there unless you can dig yourself out, pray, or cast the spell again.

Strategy

Be careful when you cast passwall without enough power to cast it or a spell of dig, or at least a pick-axe or dwarvish mattock to dig yourself out of a wall with - you may find yourself stuck waiting to power up again for a while, leaving yourself open to other phasing monsters such as xorns. On the other hand, if you find yourself being pummeled and there are no such monsters nearby, you can stick yourself in a wall while you wait to heal.

Messages

You feel a little more solid.
Your temporary phasing ability has worn off.
This page is a SLASH'EM related stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Spellbook_of_passwall&oldid=157329"

==Description==
Casting the spell grants temporary [[intrinsic]] [[phasing]], allowing you to pass through solid walls and other objects for anywhere between 50 and 149 turns before they become solid again; if you are in a solid object when the phasing wears off, you will be stuck there unless you can [[dig]] yourself out, [[pray]], or cast the spell again.

==Strategy==
Be careful when you cast passwall without enough power to cast it or a [[spell of dig]], or at least a [[pick-axe]] or [[dwarvish mattock]] to dig yourself out of a wall with - you may find yourself stuck waiting to power up again for a while, leaving yourself open to other phasing monsters such as [[xorn]]s. On the other hand, if you find yourself being pummeled and there are no such monsters nearby, you can stick yourself in a wall while you wait to heal.
